Matlab R2023b finite element implementation (piecewise constant P0 elements) for forward/adjoint HIV dynamics ODE system
Custom Newton-based solver + Conjugate Gradient Algorithm (CGA) and Adaptive Conjugate Gradient Algorithm (ACGA) with a posteriori error estimators and local time-mesh refinement
